It was a good fit. Not tight in the arms at all. Very soft. You have to wear something under it. I'm 5'7 165 lb and it's worth the price but I don't want to take a picture.
It fit the style and was my size but it literally ripped first wash lol. It’s okay because I really only wore it for a specific occasion but just be careful washing wise.

This shirt was perfect concert fashion! It’s really comfortable and made very well. Regardless of all the tears, I wasn’t cold at any point wearing this shirt. The reason I gave it a four instead of a five is because I didn’t realize just how see-through it is, and it is very difficult to put on your fingers will keep getting caught in the little  Openings . But overall, I would definitely recommend this sweater.
This item is cute. Soft comfy but the size is off it feels uncomfortable to wear. It might just be because im a bit chubby but the arms made me stressed.
It's adorable definitely my favorite outfit accessory.  Its baggy but fitting and its super soft so I'm not overwhelmed by the feeling of an itchy sweater.

As someone who is a bit more broad on my shoulders/chest area, I was a little concerned about the sizing, as this is listed as one size. I took the risk, however, and it fits surprisingly well. I will say, this is meant to be somewhat oversized so it will fit a lot of people, but will look slightly different on various body types

I absolutely love this top! I bought it to wear over a black bodycon dress and we were headed to a Goth night event. It was a hit! Soft material, high quality!

评论概述: Plus size girlies - one size fits us too?
评论详情: As someone with a “bigger body” the one-size tag scared the crap out of me. I was wrong. This is for my plus size girlies. I am 5’3, 192lbs with an hourglass shape. This hits the cut off right at my waist, it doesn’t pinch or feel tight on my arms and it is EXTREMELY flattering. New favorite shirt? About to wash it for the first time - I’ll update if that goes poorly. Otherwise? 6 out of 5 stars.

Might I add, that once you do pull a thread loose, you cannot just put it back in place. Again, overall the shirt looks really nice, however you need to be very careful of your surroundings.

评论概述: One Size is a bit subjective
评论详情: when items of clothing are one size fits all, it gets me a little worried. I did have a small problem with the arms not exactly fitting, I am 5 feet tall 8 inches for reference and weigh around 140 pounds. I am done growing for my age, and this one size didn’t exactly fit in the right places. It was baggie around my waist, Botella on my shoulders and tight around my wrists. Also, there is fraying of the seams and I had thread coming off of the shirt. I know it was intentional to have holes in the top, but they were also small plastic pieces of tags that was left on the shoulders, or as the item arrived inside out it looked.

评论概述: Short, small but very creative and cute
评论详情: Top itself is super cute and seems well made (just be careful you don't snag it in a million places, put jewelery on after). It's quite short and didn't fit on me like it does on the model, it's just very short on the torso. As soon as you lift your arms up, it's going over and exposing everything under, so be aware. I have long arms and this came close to the wrist but a little short. It's somewhat boxy/square from the side, if you do not have a large chest this might be more noticeable. This only comes in one size, so you get that it is, wish I could have done one size up and then it probably would have sat better on my body or been lower to actually cover my chest lol. Beyond that though it's very cute and pretty and gothic. I wore the bright blue tank to clearly show the fit of the shirt.

this was the only top i could find that looked like this and i wanted it so bad i ordered it knowing it would come at an unknown size. turns out it fits me (see my size above) but it is a little big. i don’t mind it, it’s really comfortable and cute! i’m not sure why it only has one size, and i find that very unfair.
